data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample PLOCK-21

Exposition W, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Gneis, Tree line 200 m, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 75%, Shrub cover 100%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Betulo pubescentis-Pinetum sylvestris, Film number: 390
